newsItems.title: Yellow dal
fullText: I cooked some yellow dal in the instant pot. I ate a full cup already. It was good.

newsItems.title: Lime juice
newsItems.summary: Made some freshly squeezed lime juice this morning
fullText: I squeezed some lime juice this morning. I added water to the lime juice to drink. Lime juice is rich is Vitamin C.

newsItems.title: Grease
newsItems.posterAltText: Doing dishes after eating chicken drumsticks
newsItems.summary: I ate chicken and did the dishes
fullText: This is a little old news. It has been a few days since I ate this.
